quote: Sometimes, when something hurts us, our hearts break a little-in a slightly ... more literal way than for humans. Our pain sort of spills out and onto anyone around us. We call it a cracked heart.
quote_letters: SOMETIMES WHEN SOMETHING HURTS US OUR HEARTS BREAK A LITTLE-IN A SLIGHTLY  MORE LITERAL WAY THAN FOR HUMANS OUR PAIN SORT OF SPILLS OUT AND ONTO ANYONE AROUND US WE CALL IT A CRACKED HEART
